概述  软件包   类  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

jcurses.widgets
类 Dialog

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.widgets.Window
      jcurses.widgets.Dialog
所有已实现的接口：
Listener, WindowListener
直接已知子类：
FileDialog, Message
public class Dialog
extends Window
implements WindowListener

This class implements a modal dialog. The diffirence to a normal window is, that a call oft the 'show' - method blocks, until the dialog window is closed.

构造方法摘要
Dialog(int width, int height, boolean border, java.lang.String title)
          The constructor.
Dialog(int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean border, java.lang.String title)
          The constructor
 
方法摘要
 boolean evaluate()
           
 void setVisible(boolean value)
          The method changes the window's visibility status
 void windowChanged(WindowEvent event)
          The method will be called by an widget, generating WindowEvent instances, if the listener has been registered by it.
 
从类 jcurses.widgets.Window 继承的方法
activate, addListener, close, closed, deactivate, getBorderColors, getClosingChar, getDefaultBorderColors, getDefaultTitleColors, getFocusChangeChar, getRectangle, getRootPanel, getTitleColors, handleInput, hide, isClosed, isVisible, moveToTheTop, onChar, pack, paint, removeListener, repaint, resize, setBorderColors, setClosingChar, setFocusChangeChar, setRootPanel, setShadow, setTitleColors, show, tryToClose
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

Dialog

public Dialog(int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height,
              boolean border,
              java.lang.String title)
The constructor

参数：
x - the x coordinate of the dialog window's top left corner
y - the y coordinate of the dialog window's top left corner
width - the width of the dialog window
height - the height of the dialog window
title - dialog's title
border - true, if the dialog window has a border, false otherwise

Dialog

public Dialog(int width,
              int height,
              boolean border,
              java.lang.String title)
The constructor. The dialog window is centered ot the screen.

参数：
width - the width of the dialog window
height - the height of the dialog window
title - dialog's title
border - true, if the dialog window has a border, false otherwise
方法详细信息

evaluate

public boolean evaluate()

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean value)
从类 Window 复制的描述
The method changes the window's visibility status

覆盖：
类 Window 中的 setVisible
参数：
value - true, if the window becomes visible, false in other case

windowChanged

public void windowChanged(WindowEvent event)
从接口 WindowListener 复制的描述
The method will be called by an widget, generating WindowEvent instances, if the listener has been registered by it.

指定者：
接口 WindowListener 中的 windowChanged
参数：
event - the event occured
